cause.description:
The purpose of this group is To help stp the problem of global worming by doing things that dont make green house gasses. The world isn't going to be arund for ever if we keep living how we are living. If we don't help out now we will have like 20 years left.
1. Drive your car less
2. Turn power off when you are not using it
3. Use air conditioners only when nessesary
cause.mission: Try and help in the prevention of global worming
cause.name: Global Worming
